@NonNullByDefault

Package com.io7m.smfj.bytebuffer

Functions for packing mesh data into Java ByteBuffers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SMFByteBufferFloat1ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a floating point attribute.
    SMFByteBufferFloat1Type
    A readable and writable floating point cursor.
    SMFByteBufferFloat2ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a floating point attribute.
    SMFByteBufferFloat2Type
    A readable and writable floating point cursor.
    SMFByteBufferFloat3ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a floating point attribute.
    SMFByteBufferFloat3Type
    A readable and writable floating point cursor.
    SMFByteBufferFloat4ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a floating point attribute.
    SMFByteBufferFloat4Type
    A readable and writable floating point cursor.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned1ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned1Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned2ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned2Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned3ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned3Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned4ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerSigned4Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses a signed integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned1ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned1Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned2ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned2Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned3ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned3Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned4ReadableType
    A readable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferIntegerUnsigned4Type
    A readable and writable cursor that addresses an unsigned integer attribute.
    SMFByteBufferPackedAttributeSetType
    A set of packed attributes in a byte buffer.
    SMFByteBufferPackedAttributeType
    A packed attribute.
    SMFByteBufferPackedMeshLoaderType
    The type of packed meshes.
    SMFByteBufferPackedMeshType
    A mesh that has been packed into a set of byte buffers.
    SMFByteBufferPackedTrianglesType
    A set of triangles packed into a byte buffer.
    SMFByteBufferPackerEventsType
    The type of byte buffer packing event listeners.
    SMFByteBufferPackingConfigurationType
    The byte buffer packing configuration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SMFByteBufferAttributePacker
    An event listener that packs data into a given ByteBuffer.
    SMFByteBufferCursors
    Cursors for reading/writing byte buffers.
    SMFByteBufferPackedAttribute
    A packed attribute.
    SMFByteBufferPackedAttribute.Builder
    Builds instances of type SMFByteBufferPackedAttribute.
    SMFByteBufferPackedAttributeSet
    A set of packed attributes in a byte buffer.
    SMFByteBufferPackedAttributeSet.Builder
    Builds instances of type SMFByteBufferPackedAttributeSet.
    SMFByteBufferPackedMesh
    A mesh that has been packed into a set of byte buffers.
    SMFByteBufferPackedMesh.Builder
    Builds instances of type SMFByteBufferPackedMesh.
    SMFByteBufferPackedMeshes
    Functions for loading and packing meshes.
    SMFByteBufferPackedTriangles
    A set of triangles packed into a byte buffer.
    SMFByteBufferPackedTriangles.Builder
    Builds instances of type SMFByteBufferPackedTriangles.
    SMFByteBufferPackingConfiguration
    The byte buffer packing configuration.
    SMFByteBufferPackingConfiguration.Builder
    Builds instances of type SMFByteBufferPackingConfiguration.
    SMFByteBufferTrianglePacker
    An event listener that packs data into a given ByteBuffer.

Package com.io7m.smfj.bytebuffer Description

Functions for packing mesh data into Java ByteBuffers.
